refsect1.title: Description

refsect2.title: gdk_pixbuf_xlib_init ()
refsect2.para: Initializes the gdk-pixbuf Xlib machinery by calling xlib_rgb_init(). This function should be called near the beginning of your program, or before using any of the gdk-pixbuf-xlib functions.

refsect2.title: gdk_pixbuf_xlib_init_with_depth ()
refsect2.para: Similar to gdk_pixbuf_xlib_init(), but also lets you specify the preferred depth for XlibRGB if you do not want it to use the default depth it picks.
